item.description:
Sponsored by Harvard College Vegetarian Society: VEGITAS

"The Most Important Conversation in Our Lifetimes Might Just Begin with Jonathan Safran Foer's Latest Book" headlines one reviewer (see below Huff Post.)

When Foer's EATING ANIMALS was released last November, there was a firestorm of publicity that brought the moral question of eating animals into the national conversation. Here are a few highlights.

* Huffington Post carried a week of daily reviews of Eating Animals, all well worth reading, but if you have time for only one, Andrew Weil's ("The Moral Ferocity of EATING ANIMALS) may be my pick:
http://www.huffington...

* This review by HSUS CEO Wayne Pacelle links to major media attention to EATING ANIMALS:
http://hsus.typepad.c...

* You can listen to Foer's hour on NPR's On Point that aired Nov. 13, 2009:
http://www.onpointrad...

Please invite your omnivorous friends for Foer's talk, and spread this invitation widely!
He'll do Q & A and sign books
item.name: Jonathan Safran Foer at Harvard University Science Center Hall D
